dashboard_page_title: Get Legally Compliant in India Easily
dashboard_page_feature_list_point1: Easily check for any legal queries of your business
dashboard_page_feature_list_point3: Trained models on real compliance documents
dashboard_page_feature_list_point5: Scan and get feedback on your product packaging
dashboard_page_ask_any_question_descript: Get answer to any legal or compliance related query for your business
dashboard_page_ask_scan_product_descript: Check if your product packaging is compliant ready, get feedbacks
query_page_description: Ask any questions about the legal and compliance of your business.
query_page_description_example: E.g. "i want to sell ice creams online on ecommerce platform, what regulations do I have to follow"
query_page_write_in_your_lang_text: Write your query in your language
query_page_speak_in_your_lang_text: Speak your query in your language
query_page_processing_image_disclaimer: Note: Currently we are only processing food and electronics product
query_page_completed_scanning_text: Completed the scanning and processing of your packaging image
query_page_error_message: something went wrong. Please try again.
query_page_image_upload_instruction_text: Please consider below things before uploading a packaging image,
query_page_image_upload_instruction_poin: Make sure the image is taken in well-lit conditions to enhance the readability and accuracy of text and details on the product's backside.
Use a high-resolution camera setting to capture the image.
Ensure that nothing is covering any part of the product's backside. Hands, fingers, or other objects should not obstruct the view of the label.
